Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Anthony Fenley
Dear Sir,
Anthony Fenley has an AVG of .345 at A Peoria Chiefs!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Wayne Cole
Dear Sir,
Wayne Cole has nothing more to prove at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .342 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Geraldo Hurley
Dear Sir,
Geraldo Hurley isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .221, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
